text: Metahelp!? :slightly_smiling_face: I twice tried to ask a question which included copy-pasting a piece of code. In both cases this Slack client just cleared this message box. Why?

elements.text: I twice tried to ask a question which included copy-pasting a piece of code. In both cases this Slack client just cleared this message box. Why?

text: Perhaps ypu exceeded the message length limit? Questions with longer code snippets might be easier to ask on discourse

text: I believe it was just one line, unless I had made some mistake in copying.
